mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from item_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into mall_item(item_num, item_name, item_price, item_allnumber, item_summary, item_date) values(ITEM_NUM_SEQ.nextval, #{item_name},#{item_price}, #{item_allnumber}, #{item_summary}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select item_num, item_name, item_type, item_size, item_gender, item_price, item_allnumber, item_summary, item_date from mall_item order by item_num desc
